definition: someone who makes mistakes because of incompetence, to kill animals, usually for food consumption
details:
noun
- someone who makes mistakes because of incompetence
= synonyms: fuckup
- a person who slaughters or dresses meat for market
= synonyms: slaughterer
- a brutal indiscriminate murderer
- a retailer of meat
= synonyms: meatman
verb
- to kill animals, usually for food consumption
= example: to kill animals, usually for food consumption
= synonyms: slaughter
